scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:utility-tools && npm run build:athena-tools
scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:utility-tools: cd tools/utility-tools && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:athena-tools: cd tools/athena-tools && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:utility-tools && npm run clean:athena-tools
scripts.test: npm run build:shared && npm run test:utility-tools && npm run test:athena-tools
scripts.test:utility-tools: cd tools/utility-tools && npm install && npm run test
scripts.test:athena-tools: cd tools/athena-tools && npm install && npm run test
